title: Tech Lead (Golang)
description:
We are seeking a Technical Leader who lead our new product to build an enterprise-grade advertising platform in a fast growing tech startup which has 6 different offices and serving more than 20 country markets.
- Take charge of forming the core architecture/code-base for the whole project to ensure long-term sustainability and scalability of the product.
- Guide team development efforts towards successful project delivery. 
- Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, estimates and work plans.
- Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards. Participate in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code.
- Supervise any performance, scalability, operation issues, evaluate and identify feasible solutions to address those problems. 
-  Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentor-ship.
requirements:
- Hunger for learning, passion for building impactful products 
- Experience with Golang
- 3+ years’ experience as a Software Developer 
- Prior experience with a live production at scale 
- Prior experience in a technical leadership position 
- Self-motivated, independent, committed.
- Agile/Scrum.
- Have experience in system designing, scaling system.
- Have experience in software design
- Management skill is required
